product_description: Graphite pencils are made of a mixture of graphite and clay, encased in wood.
Charcoal sticks are made from burnt wood and come in various forms, including vine and compressed charcoal.
Colored pencils are composed of a pigment core encased in wood. They come in a wide range of colors and can be used for detailed drawing, coloring, and layering.

Pastels are sticks made from pigment and a binder. Soft pastels have a high pigment concentration and a powdery texture, making them ideal for blending and layering. Oil pastels have a creamy consistency and can be applied thickly or thinly to create vibrant, textured effects.

product_name: Ink (Pen and Ink, Brush and Ink)
product_description: Ink is a liquid or paste containing pigments or dyes used for drawing and writing.
